name: datannur-tool
description: Query jsonjsdb relational databases using natural language with GitHub Copilot AI

chatParticipants.name: datannur
chatParticipants.description: Query jsonjsdb relational database with intelligent natural language

languageModelTools.name: datannur_execute_sql
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute a SQL query against the database and get results. Use standard SQL SELECT syntax. Parameter: sql (string) - the SQL query to execute.

languageModelTools.name: datannur_search
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search across all tables for records matching a text query. Returns matching records from all tables with relevance scores. Parameter: query (string) - the text to search for.

languageModelTools.name: datannur_get_stats
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get database statistics including total record counts for all tables and other aggregate information about the database.

scripts.compile: vite build && npm run copy-prompts && npm run copy-sqljs && cp ../src/assets/img/icon.png ./icon.png
scripts.copy-sqljs: mkdir -p out/node_modules/sql.js/dist && cp node_modules/sql.js/package.json out/node_modules/sql.js/ && cp node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.js out/node_modules/sql.js/dist/ && cp node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm out/node_modules/sql.js/dist/
